docs.title: Overview
docs.text:
SCM Chatbot is a powerful Streamlit-based chatbot application that provides:

  • 🔐 Secure user authentication
  • 💬 Real-time chat interface
  • 📊 Feedback collection and analytics
  • 👥 User session management
  • 📱 Modern, responsive design

docs.title: User Authentication
docs.text:
• Regular user login
  • Admin access with password protection
  • Session management

docs.title: Chat Interface
docs.text:
• Real-time chat with simulated responses
  • Message history tracking
  • Persistent chat logs

docs.title: Feedback System
docs.text:
• Thumbs up/down feedback
  • Feedback analytics
  • Session-wise feedback tracking

docs.title: Admin Dashboard
docs.text:
• Overall feedback statistics
  • Session-wise feedback view
  • User interaction monitoring

docs.title: Quick Links
docs.text:
• Installation Guide
  • Quick Start Guide
  • User Guide
  • API Reference

docs.title: Getting Started
docs.text:
To get started with SCM Chatbot:

  1. Install the required packages: 

    pip install -r requirements.txt

  2. Run the application: 

    streamlit run main.py

  3. Access the application at http://localhost:8501

docs.title: Contributing
docs.text: We welcome contributions! Please see our Contributing Guide for details.

docs.title: Support
docs.text: For support, please: - Check the documentation - Open an issue - Contact the maintainers

docs.title: Installation Guide
docs.text: This guide will help you set up the SCM Chatbot application on your system.

docs.title: Prerequisites
docs.text:
Before installing SCM Chatbot, ensure you have:

  • Python 3.7 or higher
  • pip (Python package installer)
  • Git (for version control)

docs.title: 1. Clone the Repository
docs.text:
git clone https://github.com/yourusername/streamlit_app.git
cd streamlit_app

docs.title: 2. Create a Virtual Environment
docs.text:
# Using venv
python -m venv venv

# Activate the virtual environment
# On Windows:
venv\Scripts\activate
# On macOS/Linux:
source venv/bin/activate

docs.title: 3. Install Dependencies
docs.text: pip install -r requirements.txt

docs.title: 4. Configure Environment Variables
docs.text:
Create a .env file in the project root:

touch .env

Add the following variables:

# Application Settings
DEBUG=True
SECRET_KEY=your-secret-key

# Database Settings (if applicable)
DATABASE_URL=your-database-url

docs.title: 5. Initialize the Application
docs.text:
# Create necessary directories
mkdir -p chat_logs

docs.title: 6. Verify Installation
docs.text:
Run the application:

streamlit run main.py

Visit http://localhost:8501 in your web browser to verify the installation.

docs.title: 1. Package Installation Errors
docs.text:
If you encounter errors during package installation:

# Update pip
python -m pip install --upgrade pip

# Try installing packages individually
pip install streamlit
pip install numpy
# ... etc.

docs.title: 2. Port Already in Use
docs.text:
If port 8501 is already in use:

# Kill the process using the port
# On Windows:
netstat -ano | findstr :8501
taskkill /PID <PID> /F

# On macOS/Linux:
lsof -i :8501
kill -9 <PID>

docs.title: 3. Virtual Environment Issues
docs.text:
If you have issues with the virtual environment:

# Remove existing environment
rm -rf venv

# Create new environment
python -m venv venv
source venv/bin/activate  # or venv\Scripts\activate on Windows
pip install -r requirements.txt

docs.title: Next Steps
docs.text:
After successful installation:

  1. Read the Quick Start Guide
  2. Configure the application in Configuration
  3. Learn about the Chat Interface

docs.text:

  • Streamlit Documentation

docs.title: Quick Start Guide
docs.text: This guide will help you get up and running with SCM Chatbot quickly.

docs.title: 1. Start the Application
docs.text: streamlit run main.py

docs.title: 2. Access the Application
docs.text:
Open your web browser and navigate to: 

http://localhost:8501

docs.title: Regular User
docs.text:
1. Enter any username (except "admin")
  2. Click "Login"

docs.title: Admin User
docs.text:
1. Check "Login as admin"
  2. Enter username "admin"
  3. Enter your password
  4. Click "Login"

docs.title: Starting a New Chat
docs.text:
1. Click "🆕 Start New Chat" in the sidebar
  2. Type your message in the chat input
  3. Press Enter or click the send button

docs.title: Viewing Chat History
docs.text:
• Today's chats appear under "📅 Today"
  • Past 7 days' chats appear under "🗓 Past 7 Days"
  • Click any chat to view its history

docs.title: Providing Feedback
docs.text:
• Use thumbs up/down buttons to rate responses
  • Feedback is automatically saved

docs.title: Accessing Admin Dashboard
docs.text:
1. Login as admin
  2. View feedback statistics in the sidebar
  3. Click "Overall Feedback Summary" for general stats
  4. Click individual sessions for detailed feedback

docs.title: Viewing Feedback
docs.text:
• Overall positive/negative feedback counts
  • Session-wise feedback breakdown
  • Chat history with feedback

docs.title: Keyboard Shortcuts
docs.text: Shortcut Action Enter Send message Ctrl + Enter New line in message Esc Clear input

docs.title: 1. Session Management
docs.text:
• Each chat session has a unique ID
  • Sessions are automatically saved
  • Access past sessions from the sidebar

docs.title: 2. Feedback Collection
docs.text:
• Provide feedback for each response
  • View feedback trends in admin dashboard
  • Track user satisfaction over time

docs.title: 3. Best Practices
docs.text:
• Keep messages clear and concise
  • Use appropriate feedback
  • Log out after session completion

docs.title: Starting a New Session
docs.text:
# The application automatically creates a new session
# when you click "Start New Chat"

docs.title: Saving Chat History
docs.text:
# Chat history is automatically saved
# No manual saving required

docs.title: Viewing Feedback
docs.text:
# Access feedback through the admin dashboard
# or view individual message feedback
